1.title: Very Low
1.description: The area is considered safe from flooding, and residents can feel secure.

2.title: Low
2.description: Minimal chance of flooding; typically considered safe.

3.title: Moderate
3.description: Some potential for flooding; caution advised, especially in vulnerable areas.

4.title: Moderate
4.description: Some potential for flooding; caution advised, especially in vulnerable areas.

5.title: Elevated
5.description: Noticeable risk of flooding; preparedness is important.

6.title: Elevated
6.description: Noticeable risk of flooding; preparedness is important.

7.title: High
7.description: Significant chance of flooding; residents should be on alert and ready to act.

8.title: High
8.description: Significant chance of flooding; residents should be on alert and ready to act.

9.title: Extreme
9.description: Very high likelihood of flooding; immediate action may be necessary, and evacuation could be warranted.

10.title: Extreme
10.description: Very high likelihood of flooding; immediate action may be necessary, and evacuation could be warranted.
